title: Team Run Image Converter by gstroin (Console) v. {0}
main_menu:
1. Convert image
2. Convert skin
3. Quit
4. Change language
action_prompt: What do you want to do:
int_parse_error: Please, enter an integer and not a word
mode_select:
Select mode:
1. Blocks (harder to move, custom layer, takes less space, may be laggy on low end devices, loads faster)
2. Text  (only one object => easier to move, can't change layer, loads longer, takes more space, can be used in nicknames, messages and floor names)
3. Optimized blocks (like Blocks, but creates less objects => takes less space)
4. Optimized text (like Text, but creates less tags => takes less space)
5. Skins (like Blocks, but creates less objects => takes less space)
image_path_prompt: Image path (Example: C:\Users\USER\Documents\image.png or image.png, if the image is in the same folder with the program):
level_path_prompt: Level path (Example: C:\Users\USER\Documents\level.trmap or level.trmap, if the level is in the same folder with the program):
float_parse_error: Please, enter a floating point number (For example: 2.1 or 4).
quality_prompt: Image quality (from 0 to 100, less for better optimization, bigger for better quality):
skins_pixsize_prompt: Skin size (at least 0.5; pixel size is 16 times smaller):
